name: Laggernauts
description:
Laggernauts is a crazy local multiplayer game. Live the battle between two factions with your friends... or enemies! Your objective is to destroy the enemy faction's home planet, using only a bomb and inertia in your favor. Your biggest nemesis? Bad Wireless connection! Are you up to the task?

Play the game locally from 2 to 8 players. Controls are all controller based.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2018
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/laggernauts

Charles Ferreira - Programmer
Diego Pontes - Musician and Sound Designer
Kaz Born - Lead Artist
Mark Dorow - UI Artist
Rafael Forbeck - Programmer
Rafael Hey - Game Designer & Producer
Thiago Almeida Vergani - Programmer
